QAPair.Question: What is (are) Alzheimer - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on Alzheimer disease : Alzheimer's Association -- www.alz.org , Alzheimers.gov -- www.alzheimers.gov , BrightFocus Foundation -- www.brightfocus.org/alzheimers , Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/aging/aginginfo/alzheimers.htm , Genetic and Rare Diseases Information Center -- rarediseases.info.nih.gov/diseases/10254/alzheimer-disease , National Institute on Aging -- www.nia.nih.gov/health/alzheimers , US National Library of Medicine, Genetics Home Reference -- medlineplus.gov/genetics/condition/alzheimer-disease/ ,
